pages.text: Skip to content FAST, FRESH, FIT. THAT’S HOW WE BOWL. TRY A FRESH, DELICIOUS POKE BOWL TODAY! Poke Bros has over 80 locations nationwide, and growing! Find Your Location >> Fresh Ingredients Fill you up but don’t slow you down BUILD YOUR BOWL VIEW OUR MENU Signature Bowls Guaranteed to satisfy every time Previous Next What is poké? Poké is essentially sushi in a bowl. This fresh healthy cuisine originated from Hawaii and features cubed-cut raw fish mixed in a bowl with rice, veggies and flavorful toppings. A build-your-own approach allows you to craft your bowl with all of the fresh and healthy ingredients you like. Your Local Spot for Fresh Poké Build your perfect bowl with premium proteins, fresh toppings, and signature sauces. A quick, healthy meal that never sacrifices flavor. Story Our Poke Bros began in 2015 with a mission to bring the bright, fresh flavors of poke to the mainland in a modern, fast-casual format. Drawing on years of restaurant expertise, our founders reimagined the classic Hawaiian staple into a customizable, grab-and-go experience built around sushi-grade fish, bold sauces, and fresh-cut ingredients. Today, our bowls offer a delicious, wholesome alternative to typical fast food—quick to order, endlessly flavorful, and made fresh every time. Learn More >> Locations Our People can’t get enough of Poke Bros. With more than 80 locations across 15 states—and growing—we’re bringing our fresh poke bowls to communities throughout the Midwest, East Coast, and beyond. Want to find the closest Poke Bros near you? Use our location finder to discover your next bowl. Find A Location >> Menu Signature Bowls Build Your Own Bowl Mochi Ice Cream Sides View Our Menu Grab a Meal to Go! Fuel your day with bold flavors made fast, fresh, and exactly how you like it. Get the Scoop! Get the latest updates to our menu and receive exclusive special offers and discounts. Subscribe Thank you for subscribing!
